title: React Developer

company.name: Webhelp Morocco
company.description: Global leader in customer experience and digital services

description: Join our team as a React Developer to create exceptional user experiences. You will work closely with designers and backend engineers to build responsive, performant web applications using the latest frontend technologies.
responsibilities: Optimize frontend performance and loading times
Develop reusable UI components using modern frameworks
Build responsive and intuitive user interfaces
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Passion for technology and continuous learning
